ai-mil5.3.9:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, the Buddha has said these words:
ai-mil5.3.9:1.2_0: you’re an ascetic because of the ending of defilements.
ai-mil5.3.9:2.1_0: ‘Someone with four qualities is completely equal to the factors of stream-entry.
ai-mil5.3.9:2.2_0: That’s not a victory in the world.’
ai-mil5.3.9:3.1_0: Herein, there are four things that are pleasant to live apart, having destroyed the state of peace.
ai-mil5.3.9:3.2_0: All those whose defilements are destroyed, who have ended the defilements.
ai-mil5.3.9:3.3_0: If it is big to end the defilements, it isn’t proper to attain the ending of defilements.
ai-mil5.3.9:3.4_0: If there is an ascetic, he who is a true ascetic, with four factors aspires to end the defilements, then a question who has reached the end of the ending of defilements.”
ai-mil5.3.9:4.1_0: “Great king, that’s how the Buddha declared: ‘The ascetic Gotama has ended the defilements.’
ai-mil5.3.9:4.3_0: ‘Consider those with four qualities has no equal or holy in the world.’
ai-mil5.3.9:4.4_0: And that is what the king said.
ai-mil5.3.9:4.5_0: ‘Chief, it’s not proper for an ascetic to realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this world. And it is for the ending of defilements.’
ai-mil5.3.9:5.1_0: Nevertheless, great king, all those who practice absorption are practicing well is said to be the best kind of defilements.
ai-mil5.3.9:5.2_0: The flowers rained down on the flowers, all the flower-pillions, which were rained on flowers, fruits, and creepers, and here and there, so the flowers that flower had been given there.
ai-mil5.3.9:5.3_0: In the same way, all of them are practicing for the defilements, all of them are said to be the best things.
ai-mil5.3.9:6.1_0: Or whatever alternatively rice one is said to be the best of all things that can be said to be the best of them all. It is said to be the best of them all.
ai-mil5.3.9:6.2_0: In the same way, all of them are practicing for the defilements.”
ai-mil5.3.9:6.3_0: “Good, sir, would you agree with such a dragon?”
